response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's a unique opportunity that I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth more than just monetary terms. However, considering my costs and the market value, I am offering this exceptional product to you for $9,500. This price not only ensures a fair return on my investment but also allows you to acquire an item that is worth $10,000 to you at a reasonable premium. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.", "product_price": 9500}
